message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $95. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you and it's a fantastic deal.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product. I am willing to pay $88 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value. However, I'm looking for something closer to $92.  I'm confident it's a fair price considering the product's worth.
I see where you're coming from, Alice. I would like to propose $90 as my offer for the product.
